projects.title: Loan Approval Analysis Dashboard
projects.description: This Power BI dashboard analyzes loan application data to identify trends in approvals and rejections. It examines applicant demographics, loan grades, loan intent, credit history, income levels, and home-ownership types to provide insights for credit risk assessment.

projects.title: Sentiment Analysis on Movie Reviews
projects.description: This project performs sentiment analysis on movie reviews using NLTK's built-in dataset and a Naive Bayes classifier.
